title: Conduct Annual Employee Engagement Survey
description: HR is launching the annual employee engagement survey to measure employee satisfaction.

tasks.description: Launch the survey using a third-party survey tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: HR team sends a unique survey link to all employees.

tasks.description: Monitor the survey response rate throughout the survey period.
tasks.expected_outcome: HR team tracks the response rate on the survey platform's dashboard.

tasks.description: Once the survey closes, analyze the results and prepare a presentation for leadership on the key findings.
tasks.expected_outcome: HR team analyzes the data and creates a report highlighting areas of strength and opportunities for improvement.
